meanings.definition: A style of popular music with a strongly accented subsidiary beat, originating in Jamaica.
meanings.sent1: I love listening to reggae music on sunny days.
meanings.sent2: The reggae band played at the beach party last night.
meanings.sent3: The reggae song was so catchy, it got stuck in my head all day.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves flowed to the reggae rhythm like a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The reggae concert was a vibrant explosion of sound and color.
